scripts.debug: npm run html && npm run css && npm run js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run debug && npm run minify
scripts.html: shx mkdir -p webapp/dist && shx cp webapp/src/index.html webapp/dist/
scripts.css: shx mkdir -p webapp/dist && lessc webapp/src/styles/style.less webapp/dist/style.css
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:html" "nodemon server/src/Server.mjs" "browser-sync start --proxy localhost:8080 --files webapp/dist"
